name: The Mad Mage of the Mechanical Nightmare
name_original: The Mad Mage of the Mechanical Nightmare
description:
CONTROLS: Arrow keys to move + navigate, Z = A, X = B, Enter = Start

Please note that there is currently no audio; it will be added in a future update.

The people of Arkham are suffering from a horrific nightmare. Every night, they see visions of a great city overrun with maddeningly unknowable machines and technology. This nightmare has been slowly eating away at their sanity, to the point where it's become a crisis. Now you, Dr. Muntz, have begun suffering from this nightmare. You have seen your patients slowly be driven insane by it, and you aren't about to give up easy. You're going to grab a gun, find the source of this damn nightmare, and put a bullet in its head. Because guns solve all of our problems!

This game was created using GB Studio, meaning it can be played on the Nintendo Game Boy (assuming you have the hardware, which I don't)! If you want to try it, you can download the rom file by clicking the link below. And if you do try it, please send me a video of the game being played, because I definitely want to see it.

Also, please consider donating and/or leaving your feedback, as either one gives me encouragement to continue making stuff like this (and hopefully eventually find a job).
